extracted-table.table-caption: The VBM and Reho comparisons between MwoA patients and healthy subjects

caption.p: The VBM and Reho comparisons between MwoA patients and healthy subjects

bold.italic: VBM comparison between MwoA patients and healthy subjects

tr.td: No brain region above the threshold.

bold.italic: Reho comparison between MwoA patients and healthy subjects

table-wrap-foot.p: HS healthy subjects, Inf infinity, IOG inferior occipital gyrus, LC locus ceruleus, MNI Montreal Neurological Institute coordinate, MOG middle occipital gyrus, MwoA migraine without aura patient, MRN median raphe nuclei, Reho regional homogeneity, VBM voxel-based morphometry

A threshold of P < 0.05 family wise error (FWE) correction at cluster level were applied for all comparisons. Z score infinity in this table means the probability of the VBM value in the peak MNI(x = − 8, y = −23, z = −9) of healthy subjects > migraineurs is approximately 100%
